title: The Spirit Within
description: The Spirit Within is an intoxicating story of a battered love with a unique supernatural twist. College student, Cassandra Blakemore may seem to have the perfect life on the outside with her loving family and friends, but on the inside she harbors a terror created by her abusive boyfriend, Raleigh Nichols, who quickly sinks his way deep into the bottom of the bottle. Cassandra's emotional strength suddenly emerges but at a price as she's faced with her worst fear.Battered and betrayed, she soon discovers hidden abilities while her own secrets unfold. As if levitation, telekinesis and premonitions weren't enough, what else is Cassandra Blakemore hiding?
author: Sheila Renee Parker
